/app/user-data/.description: Location of Dashy's configuration files on the host.
/app/user-data/.label: Config Directory [e.g. dashy-config]

Dashy.description:
A self-hostable personal dashboard. Organize your web bookmarks in a neat way.

After the first start it is necessary to use the Save to Disk option. Dashy will then create the conf.yml on the defined share volume.

Based on the offical OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
